headline: Show HN: Mprocs 0.5 – TUI for running processes, now with mouse support
description: When you work on a project you very often need the same list of commands to be running. For example: webpack serve, jest --watch, node src/server.js. With mprocs you can list these command in mprocs.yaml and run all of them by running mprocs. Then you can switch between outputs of running commands and interact with them.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Mprocs 0.5 - 运行进程的TUI，现在支持鼠标了
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Mprocs 0.5 - 運行進程的TUI，現在支持鼠標了
description_zh-Hans: 当你在一个项目上工作时，你经常需要运行相同的命令列表。例如：webpack serve，jest --watch，node src/server.js。使用 mprocs 你可以在 mprocs.yaml 中列出这些命令，并通过运行 mprocs 来运行所有这些命令。然后你可以在运行的命令的输出之间进行切换，并与它们进行交互。
